This guide is a simplified overview of '''all non-experimental changes''' in the [[Chase the Skies]] ({{BE}} 1.21.90), which assumes at least some familiarity with [[Spring to Life]] (''Bedrock Edition'' 1.21.70), excluding experimental features in this version.

== Mobs ==
=== New ===
{|{{Simple Guide table|New Mobs}}
|-
| [[Happy ghast]]
|| {{Animate|Happy Ghast.gif;Ghastling JE1 BE1.gif|150px}}
|
* Does not spawn naturally. 
* Spawned by hydrated [[Dried Ghast|dried ghasts]].
| {{xp|1|3}} (when killed by a [[player]] or tamed [[wolf]])
|
* Baby happy ghasts are called "ghastlings".
* Can be ridden on using a [[harness]].
|}

=== Changed ===
{|{{Simple Guide table|Changed Mobs}}
|-
|[[Ghast]]
|{{Animate|Ghast JE3 BE3.gif;Ghast shooting JE3 BE4.png|150px}}
| Texture resolution has been doubled to match the [[happy ghast]].
|-
|[[Piglin]]
|[[File:Piglin.png|frameless|150px]]
| The [[dried ghast]] is now available from [[bartering]].
|-
|[[Horse]], [[donkey]] and [[mule]]
|{{Animate|Creamy Horse.png;Donkey.png;Mule.png|150px}}
|Can now be fed [[carrot]]s to heal, grow, and improve their temper, with the same effect as [[apple]]s.
|}

=== Changed ===
{|{{Simple Guide table|Changed Items}}
|-
|[[Lead]]
|[[File:Lead JE2 BE2.png|84px]]
|
* Can now leash mobs to eachother, creating chains of mobs.
* The same can be done to chain [[boat]]s as well. A boat can be leashed to a happy ghast to carry it in the air.
* The [[slimeball]] in the crafting recipe has been replaced with a [[string]].
{{Crafting
|A1=String |B1=String
|A2=String |B2=String
|C3=String
|Output=Lead,2
|ignoreusage = 1
}}
|-
|[[Leather]]
|[[File:Leather JE2 BE2.png|84px]]
|Can now be found in [[monster room]], [[ancient city]], [[desert temple]], [[jungle temple]] and [[stronghold]] altar chests in quantities 1-5.
|-
|[[Saddle]]
|[[File:Saddle JE2 BE2.png|84px]]
|
* Can be removed from mobs wearing them by {{ctrl|using}} [[shears]] on the mob.
* Saddles can now be crafted with 3 [[leather]] and 1 [[iron ingot]].
{{Crafting
|B1 = Leather
|A2 = Leather
|B2 = Iron Ingot
|C2 = Leather
|Output = Saddle
}}
|-
|[[Shears]]
|[[File:Shears JE2 BE2.png|84px]]
|
* Can now remove [[saddle]]s, [[horse armor]], [[harness]]es and [[carpet]]s from mobs.
* Saddles cannot be removed from [[ravager]]s.
* [[Dispenser]]s with shears cannot remove saddles, horse armor, harnesses and carpets equipped on mobs.
|}

== Gameplay ==
=== New ===
{|{{Simple Guide table|New Gameplay}}
|-
|[[Locator bar]]
|
* Can be using to the position of other [[player]]s in [[multiplayer]] as colored indicators. 
* If the target is on a significantly different Y-level, an arrow pointing to the target vertically appears over the indicator.
* Locator bar changes based on the player's distance to its location. The further away the player to the waypoint, the smaller the icon shown on the locator bar.
* Players can prevent their positions from being shown in the locator bar; they can [[crouch|sneak]], wear a [[Head|mob head]] or [[carved pumpkin]], or be under the [[Invisibility]] effect.
|}

== Graphical ==
=== New ===
{|{{Simple Guide table|New Gameplay}}
|-
|[[Vibrant Visuals]]
|Made [[Vibrant Visuals]] the default graphics mode for supported devices.
* A form of [[Shader|Shaders]] for ''Bedrock Edition''.
* It is customizable and has two different built-in forms: Favor Performance, and Favor Visuals. Specific feature and visual settings can also be adjusted by expanding "Vibrant Visuals Options".
|}
